remarks: The span of a vector pair belongs to the range of isomorphism H i.e. is a closed subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dihprrn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihprrn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihprrn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihprrn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dihprrn.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihprrn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihprrn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
dihprrn.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
dihprrn $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , Y } ) e. ran I ) $.
